Uses of Interface
io.reinert.gdeferred.ProgressCallback

  • Packages that use ProgressCallback 
    Package Description
    io.reinert.gdeferred  
    io.reinert.gdeferred.impl  

    • Uses of ProgressCallback in io.reinert.gdeferred

      Methods in io.reinert.gdeferred with parameters of type ProgressCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Promise<D,F,P> Promise.progress(ProgressCallback<P> callback)
      This method will register ProgressCallback so that when a Deferred object is notified of progress (Deferred.notify(Object)), ProgressCallback will be triggered.
      Promise<D,F,P> Promise.then(DoneCallback<D> doneCallback, FailCallback<F> failCallback, ProgressCallback<P> progressCallback)
      Equivalent to Promise.done(DoneCallback), then FailCallback, then Promise.progress(ProgressCallback).

    • Uses of ProgressCallback in io.reinert.gdeferred.impl

      Fields in io.reinert.gdeferred.impl with type parameters of type ProgressCallback 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<ProgressCallback<P>> AbstractPromise.progressCallbacks 
      Methods in io.reinert.gdeferred.impl with parameters of type ProgressCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Promise<D,F,P> AbstractPromise.progress(ProgressCallback<P> callback) 
      Promise<D,F,P> AbstractPromise.then(DoneCallback<D> doneCallback, FailCallback<F> failCallback, ProgressCallback<P> progressCallback) 
      protected void AbstractPromise.triggerProgress(ProgressCallback<P> callback, P progress)
